item.title: Only 2 days left to claim your exhibitor spot at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025
item.description: Put your startup in the heart of the action — where 10,000+ founders, investors, press, and decision-makers come to discover what’s next.

item.title: Adobe to bring its video editing app Premiere to iPhones
item.description: Adobe is planning to bring its video editing software Premiere to the iPhone. The company has listed the app on the App Store with a pre-order link an...

item.title: Atlassian to buy Arc developer The Browser Company for $610M
item.description: Productivity software maker Atlassian has agreed to acquire The Browser Company, which makes the Arc and Dia browsers, for $610 million in cash.

item.title: DuckDuckGo adds access to advanced models to it subscription plan
item.description: With DuckDuckGo's $9.99 per month plan, users will be able to access newer models, including OpenAI’s GPT-4o and GPT-5, Anthropic’s Claude Sonnet 4, a...

item.title: Madrid’s Orbital Paradigm aims to prove a cheaper path to orbital reentry
item.description: Orbital Paradigm is moving fast and cheap to industrialize low Earth orbit.
